name: 2d mobile ballon game
description:
the game is typical hypercasual game for mobile platform.You have to feed only red birds and protect the ballon.Ballon will grow at the click and it will be harder to feed the bird.

How to play:

You have to raise the balloon to feed the bird, but the balloon will grow with every click if the balloon hits red or black birds, the game ends.Birds are born randomly, and this is required for each level.You may need to try the same level multiple times and don't forget to use your special power at advanced levels.

i upload all project files(assets codes sounds).

this game created for game 202
